page.title: 04CELEBRATING A BIRTHDAY
page.content: I awoke at 6:30am.It was my birthday. I got out of bed and opened my cards. Then I had breakfast of weetabix.Next I dressed.I went down stairs and my nextdoor neigbour brought me a present and card. Then I walked to school. First we had assembly then maths. next we went out to play. When we came in we talked about the Domesday Project after that we read then we had dinner.I had a packed lunch.In the afternoon we did P.E. After play our teacher read us a story. After school I watched He Man and my friends came we had hot dogs and chips. At 7:30 pm we went to the cinema to watch "The Last Starfighter".At 10:00 pm I went home to bed.
